title: A booke of christian ethicks or moral philosophie containing, the true difference and opposition, of the two incompatible qualities, vertue, and voluptuousnesse. Made by William Fulbecke, maister of Artes, and student of the lawes of England.
author: Fulbeck, William, 1560-1603?
publisher: Imprinted by Richard Iones, dwelling at the signe of the Rose and Crowne neere Holborne bridge,
